metadata.title: USN-5225-1 -- lxml vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that lxml incorrectly handled certain XML and HTML files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5225-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6 python-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6 python-lxml-doc - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.6 No subscription required
